instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 works with external display but not the main screen
threads.message: water damage logicboard. The LVDS connector and screen were damaged. I changed the LVDS connector but it's not giving me an image on the screen. I test it with another screen and same result. When I connect HDMI, it loads fine. any idea where I should check

threads.title: 820-4924 works with external display but not the main screen
threads.message: C8311 was bad and I replaced it. It worked with my test screen and when I connect the customer screen it didn't work. Now it's not working with my test screen

threads.title: 820-4924 works with external display but not the main screen
threads.message:
Do you get steady 5V at pins 28-30 of J8300?
DP_INT_HPD should go high at same time.
